title: Slave Girl
description: M/F BDSM Romance - Jill is a naughty girl who can't keep her panties on. When her husband, Barry, discovers her infidelities, he takes the situation firmly in hand. What starts as a spanking for his naughty girl evolves into passion that stuns them both with its sexual power. Enter Paul, the Dom who helped Barry find the courage to explore his impulses. Driven by his own motives, he leads the couple down a dark and dangerous path that threatens to tear their lives apart. Will love be enough to get them through?
author: Claire Thompson
